title: RoseWindow
description: 2nd 'Sketch' project made to test out my trims pipeline. The plan was to spend 2 weeks on it, it took a bit longer, but I'm happy with the result. For the next project, ill dive into Zbrush and make the architecture more organic. A big thanks to the Dinusty Discord Community for their feedback and support! smiley --- Everything in the project was created by me, with the exception of some Decals: Quixel, Trees: Quixel Norway Maple Tree, Weather Systems: Ultra Dynamic Sky/Ultra Dynamic Weather --- The render is based on Niklas Hamann's photo https://unsplash.com/photos/gray-and-black-concrete-building-close-up-photography-dqgrc3v9i68?utm_content=creditCopyText&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=unsplash
